by.epamtr.totalizator.dao

Interface AdminDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBAdminDAO

    public interface AdminDAO
    Interface contains methods which are required to provide administrator's work with the data storage.
    Author:
    Andrey Kryshtapovich

    • Method Detail

      • createNewGameCupoun

        boolean createNewGameCupoun(GameCupoun gameCupoun)
                     throws DAOException
        Creates new record representing particular game coupon in a data storage.
        Parameters:
        gameCupoun - GameCupoun object representing new game coupon.
        Returns:
        true if new game coupon was created in a data storage.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if creating of new game coupon fails.

      • createNewEvent

        boolean createNewEvent(Event event)
                throws DAOException
        Creates new record representing particular event in a data storage.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object representing new event.
        Returns:
        true if new event was created in a data storage.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if creating of new event fails.

      • matchEventAndGame

        boolean matchEventAndGame(int selectedGameCupounId,
                          int selectedEventId)
                   throws DAOException
        Matches event to a particular game coupon. Event will be associated with particular game coupon.
        Parameters:
        selectedGameCupounId - Id of the particular game coupon in the data storage.
        selectedEventId - Id of the event in the data storage to be matched to the game coupon.
        Returns:
        true if event was successfully matched to the game coupon.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if matching fails due to the data storage issues.

      • updateEvent

        boolean updateEvent(Event event)
             throws DAOException
        Updates record representing particular event in the data storage.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object representing particular event with up to date information.
        Returns:
        true if event's record was successfully updated.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if update fails due to the data storage issues.

      • updateGame

        boolean updateGame(GameCupoun game)
            throws DAOException
        Updates record representing particular game coupon in the data storage.
        Parameters:
        game - GameCupoun object representing particular game coupon with up to date information.
        Returns:
        true if game coupon's record was successfully updated.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if update fails due to the data storage issues.

      • unmatchEventAndGame

        boolean unmatchEventAndGame(int selectedEventId)
                     throws DAOException
        Unmatches event and the particular game coupon.
        Parameters:
        selectedEventId - Id of the event in the data storage to be unmatched with the game coupon.
        Returns:
        true if event was successfully unmatched.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if unmatching fails due to the data storage issues.

      • deleteEvent

        boolean deleteEvent(int selectedEventId)
             throws DAOException
        Deletes a record representing particular event from the data storage.
        Parameters:
        selectedEventId - Id of the event to be deleted from the data storage.
        Returns:
        true if event was deleted successfully.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if deleting fails due to the data storage issues.

      • closeGameCoupon

        int closeGameCoupon(int gameCouponId)
             throws DAOException
        Calculates the prize for bets that won in the particular drawing. Changes status of the game coupon representing particular drawing to closed or cancelled. Updates the data storage with new information.
        Parameters:
        gameCouponId - Id of the particular game coupon in the data storage.
        Returns:
        int value representing the result : 1 - game coupon closed successfully. -3 - rollback occurred. -2 - game coupon was cancelled. -1 - error there are less than 15 events in the game coupon.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if closing game coupon fails due to the data storage issues.

      • getGamesInDevelopment

        java.util.List<GameCupoun> getGamesInDevelopment()
                                          throws DAOException
        Gets all game coupons with In developing status from the data storage.
        Returns:
        List of GameCupoun objects.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.

      • getAllGames

        java.util.List<GameCupoun> getAllGames()
                                throws DAOException
        Gets all game coupons from the data storage except Closed and Cancelled ones.
        Returns:
        List of GameCupoun objects.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.

      • getUnmatchedEvents

        java.util.List<Event> getUnmatchedEvents(java.sql.Timestamp gameStartDate,
                                         java.sql.Timestamp gameEndDate)
                                  throws DAOException
        Gets all events from the data storage that could be matched to the particular game coupon.
        Parameters:
        gameStartDate - Timestamp object representing particular game coupon's start date
        gameEndDate - Timestamp object representing particular game coupon's end date
        Returns:
        List of Event objects.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.

                                          throws DAOException
        Gets a particular game coupon from a data storage.
        Parameters:
        gameCupounId - Id of the game coupon in the data storage.
        Returns:
        List containing GameCupoun object.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.

      • getResultDictionaryData

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getResultDictionaryData()
                                                                   throws DAOException
        Gets all data about available results from the data storage.
        Returns:
        Map key - number of result. value - result's description.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.

      • getStatusDictionaryData

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getStatusDictionaryData()
                                                                   throws DAOException
        Gets all data about available statuses from the data storage.
        Returns:
        Map key - number of status. value - status's description.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails due to the data storage issues.
